data.title: A nasty bout of food poisoning has laid Stephen low.
data.meta_description: Yeah, hi guys. Yeah, Sunday. It's raining. More rain. Never mind. Hopefully it will get better during the week. Hopefully. Yeah I was pretty poorly sick Friday night. Yeah. Think I had a touch of food poisoning. Oh I was sick. Really really sick. It frightened me to death because…
data.text:
Yeah, hi guys. Yeah, Sunday. It’s raining. More rain. Never mind. Hopefully it will get better during the week. Hopefully.

Yeah I was pretty poorly sick Friday night. Yeah. Think I had a touch of food poisoning. Oh I was sick. Really really sick. It frightened me to death because I couldn’t breathe properly, and with COPD it’s difficult to breathe, you know, straining your throat. Yeah it was awful. Feeling better now. Better than what it was, Friday night, that’s for sure.

It was awful, really awful. It was some meat that was off, so I had a touch of food poisoning. It was horrendous. Oh it was just awful, and of course it was- yeah, not good. But feeling better now anyway, feeling a lot better today, which helps doesn’t it. But can’t go out anywhere today, it’s raining, and it’s rubbish weather, so what do you do? Just stay at home, stay in, watch TV or do something. It’s nice to have me grandkids up yesterday so that was good. They always make my day. So proud of them. Really proud of them.
